definition: hand and foot/movement of limbs/action/trick/step in a procedure (CL: 道[dao4])
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

(coll.) to tamper with/to mess around with
to bind oneself hand and foot

sentences.english: All voting systems are open to tampering and error.
sentences.chinese: 所有的投票系統都能被人做手腳或出錯。

sentences.english: He gave Powell secretary of state and then began to box him up.
sentences.chinese: 他給了鮑威爾國務卿的位子，然後開始捆住他的手腳。

sentences.english: They are heaping chain on chain around the limbs of their subjects.
sentences.chinese: 他們在自己臣民的手腳上套上更多的鎖鏈。

sentences.english: At the same time, this fact fetter the trick of the judicial authority, indulge the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 同時也束縛了司法機關的手腳，造成寬縱罪犯的後果。

sentences.english: The robbers hound her hand and foot and left her on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 強盜們捆住她的手腳，把她扔在地板上。

sentences.english: I was so scared that my blood ran cold .
sentences.chinese: 我真是給嚇得手腳冰冷，魂不附體。

sentences.english: I have no cramps and I feel strong.
sentences.chinese: 我手腳沒有抽筋，我感到身強力壯。

sentences.english: They tie the hands and legs of suspects like roasted chickens.
sentences.chinese: 他們把嫌疑犯的手腳捆綁起來，就像烤雞那樣。

sentences.english: I panicked when my boss guessed what I was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 當老闆猜到我在想什麼時我慌了手腳。

sentences.english: They bound my arms and legs with rope.
sentences.chinese: 他們用繩子捆住我的手腳。

sentences.english: She's all thumbs, I'm afriad it's going to take her years to finish a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她手腳好笨哪，恐怕要好幾年才能織完一件毛衣。

sentences.english: With infinite patience she prepared to snare me and bind me.
sentences.chinese: 她以無限的耐心準備把我網羅住，捆住我的手腳。

sentences.english: Little fish nibbled at her arms and legs. She closed her eyes and floated.
sentences.chinese: 小魚輕咬着她的手腳，她閉上眼睛漂浮着。

sentences.english: He felt he was hemmed in the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 他感到他被婚姻束縛住了手腳。

sentences.english: Once the character is defined I begin to work on the background and play with color.
sentences.chinese: 人物塑造好後，我就開始在背景和顏色方面動手腳。

definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
